lines.text: Jesus. You know if you guys spent half the time studying instead of setting up these stunts, we'd all be graduating with honors.
What a little twat. We should have left her behind.
Why? Her behind is the best part. We should have kept her behind and left the rest of her.
But Seth is bringing back help.
If you weren't screaming, and we weren't screaming - then someone is trying to mind fuck us here.

[Explaining why they shouldn't try climbing over the high fence]
They'd be likely to cut their nuts off.
